Package moteur

Class Jest

  • java.lang.Object
    • moteur.Jest
  • public class Jest
extends java.lang.Object
    The class Jest is an agregation of cards, more specifically, is made up of CardsAJouer. Jest is a pile of cards in front of the player, which is to say, in each game, there will possibly be 3 or 4 Jests. On your turn the player must take 1 card from another playerâ€™s complete Offer and add it to his/her Jest. Keep the cards in the Jest face-down, separate from any other cards in play.

    This class has 4 methodes, which ensure the basic operations. With a linked list named cards, the elements are of type of CardsAJouer, which correspondes the real situation. The methodes of class can get the number of rest cards, can get the whole ensemble of the stack. Also, most importantly, with shuffle(), the cards in the stack will be shuffled, shall be used at the very begining of the game.
